I want a small flagship Android phone

stories.text:
I feel like I'm talking to family and friends on the phone very rarely as we now have texting and social media to keep up. But I also do enjoy the times I get to have phone calls with people, but it's rare now .

Do you still talk on the phone with people? How do you decide when it's appropriate to call?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you talk to family and friends on the phone?
Interpreting the Callgrind and gperftools profilers results
How to Write Software with Mathematical Perfection

stories.text:
Hey HN!

I built unitunes to take control of my music. unitunes is a CLI tool that can transfer songs between services and keep playlists in sync. It is a free open source alternative to paid services such as Soundiiz and TuneMyMusic.

unitunes stores your playlists in plain text, allowing you to version control your music. Playlists can be pushed and pulled from streaming services. Tracks from one service can be searched on another.

Currently spotify, musicbrainz, and youtube music are supported. I hope to add support for all kinds of "services", such as local files, musescore, osu!, beatsaber, genius, or anywhere else music exists in some form.

I'm looking for collaborators to help add more services and improve the search algorithm!

https://github.com/platers/unitunes
stories.title: Show HN: Unitunes â€“ Transfer, sync, and backup playlists on music services
